metadata.title: CVE-2018-12247 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in mruby 1.4.1. There is a NULL pointer dereferencein mrb_class, related to certain .clone usage, because mrb_obj_clone inkernel.c copies flags other than the MRB_FLAG_IS_FROZEN flag (e.g., theembedded flag).

criterions.comment: mruby package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
